Gra

public Gra()
Method Detail

create

public void create()
This method is called right after initialize() method in Android Project. Loads meshes(.obj) and textures(.png) from /data folder. Creates perspective camera. Starts physics.

Specified by:
create in interface com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener
Throws:
java.io.IOException - This Exception is thrown when specific file is not found.

resize

public void resize(int width,
                   int height)
Specified by:
resize in interface com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

render

public void render()
This method is responsible for OpenGL rendering mechanism. Adds lighting to the world. Checks rigidBody map for proper collisionshapes (like SphereShape or BoxShape).

Specified by:
render in interface com.badlogic.gdx.ApplicationListener

public void pause()
Specified by:

public void dispose()
Destroys every model and texture from world.
